snippet: A growing number of professional investors are betting that the craze for bonds has gone too far, perhaps dangerously so.
abstract: Growing number of professional investors are betting that increase in bond investments over the past four years has gone too far, warning that perennially safe bond investments are due for drop in value as faith in government increases.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of professional investors are betting that the craze for bonds has gone too far, perhaps dangerously so.

headline.seo: Big in 2012, but the Future Is Hazy for Bonds
headline.main: Bond Craze Could Run Its Course in New Year
headline.print_headline: Bond Craze Could Run Its Course In New Year
